.. _content_crawling:

Content Crawling
================

.. automodule:: infobrief.scraping.crawl

Article Publisher Crawling
--------------------------

How we crawl publishers of articles

.. autoclass:: bcml.feed_parsing.TranscriptionMethod
   :members:

The main podcast parsing function is ``select_and_parse_podcasts``.

.. autofunction:: bcml.feed_parsing.select_and_parse_podcasts

API Data Crawling
-----------------

The main article parsing function is ``select_and_parse_articles``.

.. autofunction:: bcml.feed_parsing.select_and_parse_articles
